summary: The Keep Seniors Fed Act (H.R. 4967) aims to amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008. It specifically excludes income received under Title II of the Social Security Act when determining eligibility for SNAP benefits (formerly known as food stamps). The bill also addresses specific existing paragraphs within the Act, modifying or deleting them. The Act is set to take effect 90 days after its enactment.
